text: Mária Kolíková is a Slovak politician who currently serves as the justice minister of Slovakia; she was nominated by Za ľudí. She is working on reforming the judiciary system and reducing corruption by investigating corrupt justices and improving public trust in the judiciary. Kolíková previously worked in the Justice Ministry when Lucia Žitňanská was minister. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Justice ministers of Slovakia Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Female justice ministers Category:Government ministers of Slovakia Category:Women government ministers of Slovakia
title: Mária Kolíková
